net.sf.jclec.pso

Class ParticleSpecies

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.realarray.RealArraySpecies
      • net.sf.jclec.realarray.RealArrayIndividualSpecies
        • net.sf.jclec.pso.ParticleSpecies
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure, net.sf.jclec.ISpecies, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC

    public class ParticleSpecies
extends net.sf.jclec.realarray.RealArrayIndividualSpecies
    A species for PSO algorithms. It is an specialization of RealArrayIndividualSpecies that take into account the specific properties of particles.

    HISTORY:

    • (AR|JRR|SV, 1.0, March 2018) First release.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aurora Ramirez (AR), Jose Raul Romero (JRR), Sebastian Ventura (SV)

    Knowledge Discovery and Intelligent Systems (KDIS) Research Group: http://www.uco.es/grupos/kdis

    See Also:
    RealArrayIndividual, Particle, PSOAlgorithm, Serialized Form
